article:
Jesuits have founded and managed a number of institutions, notably universities,
which have produced many well-known alumni.

The most prominent of these universities are in the United States where they are
organized as the Association of Jesuit Colleges and Universities. In Latin
America they are organized in the AsociaciÃ³n de Universidades Confiadas a la
